page.title: 09ASTWOOD BANK/SAMBOURNE
page.content:
Astwood Bank has a main road passing along the eastern edge of the village. The back streets are quiet and peaceful.
Many of the houses in Astwood Bank are pre-1914.There over 10 factories,which are mainly metal working.There is a post-office,2 banks,3 garages,4 pubs, 3 churches,5 food shops and numerous other commercial concerns.It is a busy thriving community.
Sambourne,in contrast ,is a peaceful village with little traffic.There is 1 pub called the Green Dragon,which is popular.The village is in a rural setting and in the centre is a village green.There is one shop which is also the post office and general stores.
